description:
Nikaido dons a powerful mask to defeat her enemy, only to find the attack was a trap by En. With Tanba`s help, Caiman visits one of the Cross-Eyes.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Lonely Caiman / Before Nightmare / Manju Terror
Lonely Caiman / Nightmare Before / Manjuu Kowai
ロンリー・カイマン / ナイトメア・ビフォー / まんじゅうコワイ
